sentences.english: The additional troops quickly divided the North Korean forces, which had been stretched from north to south.
sentences.chinese: 增援部队迅速分，被拉长了，从南到北朝鲜的力量。

sentences.english: Green sends in reinforcements to pick them up at the water tower.
sentences.chinese: 格林派出了增援去水塔接他们。

sentences.english: He ordered his men to attack as soon as reinforcements arrived.
sentences.chinese: 他下达命令，指示手下增援一到，马上进攻。

sentences.english: As the operation unraveled, the U. S. team called for help.
sentences.chinese: 战斗打响后，美军的这支特种部队要求增援。

sentences.english: The Legion was split into special mission groups, often to supplement other clone missions.
sentences.chinese: 兵团被划分为若干别动队，经常增援其他克隆人部队。

sentences.english: Two companies were moved up to reinforce the front line.
Follow-on reinforcements would come from the United States.
sentences.chinese: 更多后续增援部队将从美国赶来。

sentences.english: Another detachment of militiamen was drawn out to reinforce the main forces.
sentences.chinese: 又派出一支民兵去增援主力部队。

sentences.english: Liu town and Xu Darong struggled to fight back when, at the same time notify the other players reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 柳时镇和徐大荣奋力反击，同时通知其他队员增援。

sentences.english: Hails of bottles and bricks were intermittently thrown at police from side streets as reinforcements arrived.
sentences.chinese: 增援的警察到达时从人群中飞出大量的砖头和燃烧瓶。

sentences.english: His force of the I Corps had now been supplemented by the 1st Calvary Division.
sentences.chinese: 法兰克斯此时得到了第一骑兵师的增援。

sentences.english: More reinforcements were on the way.
sentences.chinese: 更多的增援部队正在来到。

sentences.english: French troops, making a last-ditch stand at the river Marne, were in desperate need of reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 法军背城借一，在马恩河布防，同时亟待增援。

sentences.english: Cloth-lined imitation leather, with leather straps and reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 布内衬仿皮革，皮革皮带和增援。

sentences.english: Under the unified leadership of headquarters, emergency assistance actions shall be implemented.
sentences.chinese: 在指挥部的统一指挥下，具体实施应急增援行动。

sentences.english: The guerillas dived into the woods to ambush the enemy reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 游击队员们钻进树林，准备伏击敌人的增援部队。

definition: to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to go to war/to engage in war
